name: stimulation of deep well, for geothermal power | stimulation, deep well | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13288/documentation

This datasets represents the stimulation of a deep well intended to be used for power production in a geothermal power plant. ;This inventory includes energy use; and water use only. Potential use of chemicals, such as hydrochloric acid, is neglected due to scarcity of available information on this. Possible greenhouse gas emissions due to the emissions of natural gas from the ground during the stimulation are not considered due to scarcity of experience.;Detailed information on this dataset is presented in the book "Energy from the Earth. 2015. Hirschberg, Wiemer, Burgherr (eds.) (see field "Data Generator and Publication").

Input of energy and water for well stimulation.

Stimulated well.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/09:Mining support service activities/099:Support activities for other mining and quarrying/0990:Support activities for other mining and quarrying

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Represents installation of a deep geothermal power plant in Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Information on chemicals used during stimulation were scarce, so that the process is modelled with the use of water and energy only.

publication.name: S Hirchberg, S Wiemer, P Burgherr2015

flow.name: stimulation, deep well
